original_text: Then they will know that I am the Lord. They will see the dead bodies of their own people. The bodies will be lying among the idols that they worshipped. They will be lying around the altars of their false gods, on every high hill and mountain. The dead bodies will lie under the big trees where they offered incense to all their idols.
korean_text: 그 죽임 당한 시체들이 그 우상들 사이에, 제단 사방에, 각 높은 고개 위에, 모든 산 꼭대기에, 모든 푸른 나무 아래에, 무성한 상수리나무 아래 곧 그 우상에게 분향하던 곳에 있으리니 내가 여호와인 줄을 너희가 알리라

sentences.original_text: Then they will know that I am the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그들이 내가 여호와인 줄 알리라.

sentences.original_text: They will see the dead bodies of their own people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기 백성의 죽은 시체들을 보리라.

sentences.original_text: The bodies will be lying among the idols
They will be lying around the altars of their false gods,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기들의 거짓 신들의 제단 주위에 누워 있으리라

sentences.original_text: on every high hill and mountain.
The dead bodies will lie under the big trees
sentences.korean_translation: 죽은 시체들이 큰 나무들 아래에 누워 있으리라

sentences.original_text: where they offered incense to all their idols.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 자기들의 모든 우상에게 향을 드렸던 곳.
